update_flow.update_available_text:
A new version ({{latestVersion}}) is available. Please, update PersonaPlus to the latest version.

"Update" will redicert you the latest APK's download page.

"Changelog" will take you the release's GitHub page to see a summary of what's new.
update_flow.youre_maybe_up_to_date: Couldn't check the repository. You may or may not be up to date.
update_flow.cant_check_if_youre_up_to_date: Couldn't check if there are new updates. Please, try again later (or manually check the repository).

developer.description: Enables access to advanced developer info, useful for testing and contribution purposes.

danger_zone.subheader: Delete ALL data (profile, objectives, stats...) from PersonaPlus. There's no way to undo this or to recover your data. Not recommended, unless you're using PersonaPlus for testing purposes.

danger_zone_flow.title: Are you sure?
danger_zone_flow.subtitle: Again: THERE - IS - NO - WAY - BACK.

specific_errors.lang_react_error: Got a React error trying to change language!

all_done: Feel proud of yourself, don't you?
That is right, you have completed ALL of your objectives for today.
Now plan something else and make this day even more productive!
"Giving yourself a PLUS" seems to be worth it, right?
Take a moment to celebrate your accomplishments!
All tasks checked off! Well done, keep up the momentum.
Another productive day in the books. Great job!
Mission accomplished! What's next on your list?
Not enough? You can go to your dashboard and add something else.
Who could tell a phone app could help you get so much done?
add objective -> acomplish it -> feel good -> repeat
bro finally got out his cave
For today; objectives due tomorrow aren't shown ;)
